subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick beat the defending champion Novak Djokovic, 6-3, 6-2, to reach the semifinals of the BNP Paribas Open at Indian Wells, Calif. Djokovic, the third seed, made 30 unforced errors, 18 more than No. 7 Roddick. No. 6 Vera Zvonareva beat Victoria Azarenka, 6-3, 6-3, to gain the women’s final. tennis.
